pull_requests.title: BIP-345: withdraw
pull_requests.body: This proposal has basically been replaced by #1793. See https://delvingbitcoin.org/t/withdrawing-op-vault-bip-345/1670 for rationale.

comment_list.body: The CI is failing because of the color of the table row in the README.mediawiki
Edited with permission of @jamesob to fix CI issue. Checked with @instagibbs out-of-band who supports the change.

pull_requests.title: fix: Add missing link to Value Overflow Incident in BIP-0099
pull_requests.body:
Added proper link to the Value Overflow Incident (August 2010) that created 184 billion BTC due to integer overflow, which was subsequently fixed through a controlled fork.

Resolves the TODO on line 347.
